expo.name: App Platform - UniApp
expo.description:
App Platform - All in one React Native Universal Mobile App. 
This is all in one Multi-Purpose Expo React Native Mobile app.
It works for iPhone and Android. In fact, this is a bundle of multiple apps, that follow same design and coding pattern. Buy this app for for $49$ on https://codecanyon.net/item/universal-app-platform-full-multipurpose-all-in-one-react-native-mobile-app/21247686
